item.title: 洛克希德-马丁公司就美国对 F-35 合同定价缺陷的指控达成和解
item.description: 美国司法部周四表示，美国国防承包商洛克希德-马丁公司（Lockheed Martin Corporation）已同意支付2974万美元，以了结对F-35军用飞机合同定价缺陷的指控。【原文：U.S. defense contractor Lockheed Martin Corporation has agreed to pay $29.74 million to settle allegations of defective pricing on contracts for F-35 military aircraft, the U.S. Justice Department said on Thursday.】

item.title: 化妆品需求疲软影响年度预测，精灵美容股价大跌
item.description: 精灵美容公司（Elf Beauty）的股价在周四的延时交易中暴跌 20%以上，此前该化妆品公司下调了年度净销售额和利润预期，理由是年初大众美容产品需求疲软。【原文：Elf Beauty's shares tumbled over 20% in extended trading on Thursday, after the cosmetics company cut its annual net sales and profit forecasts, citing weak demand in the mass beauty category at the start of the year.】

item.title: 加拿大央行行长称特朗普的关税威胁已产生影响
item.description: 加拿大央行行长蒂夫-马克莱姆（Tiff Macklem）周四表示，美国的政策转变正在引发不确定性，唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税威胁已经对企业和家庭造成了影响。【原文：Bank of Canada's Governor Tiff Macklem said on Thursday that a policy shift in the U.S. was causing uncertainty and President Donald Trump's tariff threats were already impacting business and households.】

item.title: 富兰克林邓普顿寻求美国证券交易委员会批准推出新的加密货币指数 ETF
item.description: 富兰克林邓普顿投资公司（Franklin Templeton Investments）周四表示，该公司正在寻求监管部门批准推出一款新的加密货币指数交易所交易基金，因为资产管理公司希望在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赢得美国总统大选之际，在加密货币浪潮中套现。【原文：Franklin Templeton Investments is seeking regulatory approval to launch a new crypto index exchange-traded fund, the firm said on Thursday, as asset managers hope to cash in on the crypto wave amid Donald Trump's victory in U.S. presidential elections.】

item.title: 达拉斯联储罗根发出降息信号，要求美国劳动力市场降温
item.description: 达拉斯联邦储备银行行长洛里-洛根（Lorie Logan）周四表示，只要劳动力市场不出现动摇，即使通胀率下降到接近美联储2%的目标，她也准备在 "相当长的一段时间内 "维持利率不变。【原文：Dallas Federal Reserve Bank President Lorie Logan on Thursday signaled she was ready to keep interest rates on hold for "quite some time" even if inflation drops closer to the Fed's 2% goal, as long as the labor market does not falter.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，特朗普的巴黎人工智能峰会代表团将不包括人工智能安全研究所的工作人员
item.description: 下周在巴黎举行的一次重要人工智能峰会上，美国代表团将不包括该国人工智能安全研究所的技术人员，两位接近华盛顿此次活动计划的人士和第三位知情人士告诉路透社记者。【原文：The U.S. delegation to a major artificial intelligence summit in Paris next week will not include technical staff from the country's AI Safety Institute, two people close to Washington's plans for the event and a third source briefed on the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 日本央行重新审视劳动力紧缩为更多加息敞开大门
item.description: 日本央行将经济活动疲软归咎于长期劳动力短缺，而非需求停滞。【原文：The Bank of Japan is blaming chronic labour shortages, not stagnant demand, for weak economic activity.】

item.title: 官员称扎克伯格周四在白宫参加会议
item.description: 据一位白宫官员称，Meta 首席执行官马克-扎克伯格周四在白宫参加会议。【原文：Meta Chief Executive Mark Zuckerberg was at the White House on Thursday for meetings, according to a White House official.】

item.title: 早间竞标：印度着眼于历史性降息，全球宽松势头增强
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: Illumina 预测 2025 年收入大幅低于预期
item.description: 基因测序机制造商Illumina周四预测2025年收入将大幅低于华尔街预期，这表明市场对其基因测试和诊断工具的需求疲软，股价在盘后交易中下跌近4%。【原文：Gene sequencing machine maker Illumina forecast 2025 revenue largely below Wall Street estimates on Thursday, signaling subdued demand for its genetic tests and diagnostic tools, sending shares down nearly 4% in extended trading.】

item.title: 特朗普冻结开支打击高价值投资项目
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统的政府已经暂停了美国政府对各州和地方社区的拨款，这是其大幅削减联邦开支的举措之一。【原文：President Donald Trump's administration has placed holds on U.S. government grants to states and local communities as part of its drive to significantly reduce federal spending.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：电动卡车制造商尼古拉接近申请破产
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周四援引知情人士的话报道，电动卡车制造商尼古拉即将申请破产。【原文：Electric-truck maker Nikola is nearing filing for a bankruptcy, the Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 花旗银行：金价将继续上涨，短期内将达到3000美元/盎司
item.description: 全球主要银行预计，由于地缘政治的不确定性继续左右投资者的情绪，金价将在整个 2025 年保持高位，有可能达到 3000 美元大关。【原文：Leading global banks anticipate that gold prices will remain elevated throughout 2025, potentially reaching the $3,000 mark, as geopolitical uncertainties continue to shape investor sentiment.】

item.title: Pinterest 预计收入将超过预期，因为人工智能工具增加了广告支出
item.description: 周四，Pinterest 预测第一季度营收将高于市场预期，并押注于该图片分享平台的人工智能广告工具将提高广告支出，从而使其股价在盘后交易中上涨了 22%。【原文：Pinterest forecast first-quarter revenue above market estimates on Thursday, betting on the image-sharing platform's artificial intelligence-powered advertising tools to boost ad spend, sending its shares up 22% in extended trading.】

item.title: Take-Two Interactive 预测第四季度预订额低于预期
item.description: 周四，Take-Two 互动软件公司预测其第四季度预订额低于华尔街预期，原因是投资者在等待备受期待的《侠盗猎车手6》的最新进展时，其热门游戏支出放缓。【原文：Take-Two Interactive Software forecast its fourth-quarter bookings below Wall Street expectations on Thursday, hit by slower spending on its popular titles as investors await updates on the highly anticipated "Grand Theft Auto VI".】

item.title: 律师称，对美国新规有戒心的公司争相在周五前提交兼并申请
item.description: 律师们本周表示，在乔-拜登总统执政期间通过的一项新的、更严格的兼并申报规定生效之前，各公司本周正在争分夺秒地通知反垄断机构有关未决交易。【原文：Companies are racing against the clock this week to notify antitrust agencies about pending deals before a new, more stringent merger filing rule passed during President Joe Biden's administration comes into effect, lawyers said this week.】

item.title: 亚马逊季度营收超预期，云计算增长滞后
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）周四公布的去年最后一个季度的销售额超过了华尔街的预期，因为强劲的假日购物季提振了其零售业务，但由于云计算部门的疲软，投资者推动股价下跌。【原文：Amazon.com posted sales in last year's final quarter that topped Wall Street estimates on Thursday, as a strong holiday shopping season boosted its retail business, but investors drove shares down due to weakness in the cloud computing unit.】

item.title: 美国债券市场对贝森特的 10 年期收益率承诺反应冷淡
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）承诺控制10年期国债收益率，但周四债券市场上出现了一些怀疑的声音，因为通胀压力和联邦赤字扩大的预期有可能超过抑制借贷成本的努力。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent's pledge to contain yields on 10-year Treasury notes met some skepticism in the bond market on Thursday, as inflationary pressures and expectations of a widening federal deficit threaten to outweigh efforts to curb borrowing costs.】

item.title: 高管称，尽管特朗普提出了计划，美国二叠纪盆地的石油产量增长仍将在 2025 年放缓
item.description: 能源高管周四预测，尽管美国总统唐纳德-特朗普誓言最大限度地提高产量，但美国产量最高的二叠纪盆地今年的石油产量增长预计将放缓至少25%。【原文：Growth in oil output from the U.S. Permian basin, the country's most prolific formation, is expected to slow by at least 25% this year despite President Donald Trump's vow to maximize production, energy executives forecast on Thursday.】

item.title: 波士顿联储为特朗普贸易关税制定通胀对策
item.description: 波士顿联邦储备银行周四发布的一份报告称，特朗普政府寻求的全套关税措施将给本已处于高位的通胀带来明显的上行压力。【原文：The full suite of tariffs sought by the Trump administration would have created notable upward pressure for already high levels of inflation, a report by the Federal Reserve Bank of Boston released on Thursday said.】

item.title: 美国顶级资产管理公司因中国基金问题面临共和党各州检察长的审查
item.description: 由 17 位共和党州总检察长组成的小组声称，包括贝莱德（BlackRock）和道富（State Street）在内的美国顶级资产管理公司对其在中国的投资进行了不当或不充分的披露。【原文：A group of 17 Republican state attorneys general alleged that top U.S. asset managers, including BlackRock and State Street , were making improper or inadequate disclosures about their investments in China.】

item.title: 保时捷称汽车研发费用将影响 2025 年营业利润
item.description: 保时捷股份公司（Porsche AG）周四表示，其子公司的汽车开发和电池业务支出将在 2025 年对其营业利润和汽车净现金流产生高达 8 亿欧元（8.308 亿美元）的影响。【原文：Porsche AG said on Thursday that expenses for the vehicle development and battery activities in its subsidiaries will impact its operating profit and automotive net cash flow for up to 800 million euros ($830.80 million) in 2025.】

item.title: 巴西 Galipolo 发现加密货币使用量激增，称 90% 的流量与稳定币有关
item.description: 巴西央行行长加布里埃尔-加里波洛（Gabriel Galipolo）周四表示，过去两三年来，巴西的加密资产使用量激增，其中约 90% 的流量与稳定币有关。【原文：Brazil's central bank chief Gabriel Galipolo said on Thursday that crypto asset usage in the country has surged over the past two to three years, with around 90% of the flow linked to stablecoins.】

item.title: 管理者和倡导者称，用于美国项目的数十亿美元资金仍被特朗普冻结
item.description: 路透社的一项分析发现，唐纳德-特朗普总统已经搁置了国会批准的数百亿美元的项目支出，这些项目包括从爱荷华州大豆种植者采用更环保的做法到弗吉尼亚州铁路扩建等。【原文：President Donald Trump has placed holds on tens of billions of dollars in congressionally-approved spending for projects across the U.S. that range from Iowa soybean farmers adopting greener practices to a Virginia railway expansion, a Reuters analysis found.】

item.title: 贝森特关注 10 年期美国国债收益率可能会让美联储放松警惕
item.description: 特朗普政府开始关注长期国债收益率，这可能表明其对可能阻碍唐纳德-特朗普总统经济计划的市场制约因素越来越敏感，同时也让美联储摆脱了他的直接控制。【原文：The Trump administration's emerging focus on long-term Treasury bond yields may show growing sensitivity to market constraints that could impede President Donald Trump's economic plans, while also getting the Federal Reserve out of his direct line of fire.】

item.title: 古尔斯比美联储为最终减息做好了充分准备，尽管不确定性意味着要放慢脚步
item.description: 芝加哥联储主席奥斯汀-古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）周四表示，一个充分就业、增长稳健且通胀率下降的经济将使美国联邦储备委员会（Federal Reserve）得以继续降息，尽管关税和其他政策变化的影响存在不确定性，但仍需要放慢步伐。【原文：A full-employment economy with solid growth and falling inflation will let the U.S. Federal Reserve continue cutting interest rates, though uncertainty about the impact of tariffs and other policy changes argues for a slower approach, Chicago Fed President Austan Goolsbee said on Thursday.】

item.title: 研究称，澳大利亚公司因高管薪酬接近创纪录水平而面临投资者的愤怒
item.description: 股东顾问公司 Georgeson 的一项研究显示，2024 年，因薪酬计划而面临投资者反对的澳大利亚公司数量连续第二年接近历史最高水平。【原文：The number of Australian companies facing investor opposition over remuneration plans held near record levels for a second straight year in 2024, according to a study by shareholder advisor Georgeson.】

item.title: OpenAI 表示德克萨斯州的数据中心将成为星际之门项目的 "旗舰"。
item.description: 聊天软件制造商 OpenAI 周四表示，德克萨斯州将成为其与软银合作建设的星际之门项目中的 "旗舰 "数据中心所在地。【原文：ChatGPT maker OpenAI said on Thursday that Texas will be the "flagship" data center site in the Stargate project it is building with SoftBank .】

item.title: 美国和巴拿马总统计划在运河争端中举行会谈
item.description: 巴拿马总统何塞-劳尔-穆利诺（Jose Raul Mulino）周四在社交媒体上表示，他将于周五下午3:30与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）通话，巴拿马运河问题上的对峙日趋紧张。【原文：Panamanian President Jose Raul Mulino said on social media on Thursday that he would speak to his U.S. counterpart Donald Trump at 3:30pm on Friday afternoon, amid an increasingly tense standoff over the Panama Canal.】

item.title: 特朗普传媒申请针对比特币和美国产业的投资产品商标
item.description: 特朗普媒体和技术集团（Trump Media and Technology Group）周四表示，它已经申请了六种追踪比特币和美国制造业及能源行业的投资产品的商标。【原文：Trump Media and Technology Group said on Thursday it has applied to trademark six investment products that track bitcoin and the U.S. manufacturing and energy sectors.】
